subject: Re: A couple from my test session with box #8
author: draiga1
full_text:
That's funny! Yeah, I don't know how they do it either, but I'm glad too.

~Draiga

--- In EVP-ITC@yahoogroups.com, "Urkel23" <urkel23@...> wrote:
>
> Formal Session???  I haven't had one of those since i started building this stuff.  I usually just record a sample anymore, yet they still get messages through.  It still amazes me how it's done, not sure how they do it but i'm glad they can.
> 
> -Steve
